result_list.explanation: Angélique, sans lui répondre, tire la boîte aux bijoux et la lui rend sans le regarder : elle la met dans sa main ; et il s'arrête comme surpris et sans la lui remettre, après quoi il sort. (Angélique, without answering him, takes the jewelry box and gives it back to him without looking at him: she puts it in his hand; and he stops as if surprised and without giving it back to her, after which he leaves.) This describes interaction with an object.
